nodes.bodyText:
What do you think about naming it recursionLimit?
other parameters only have verb prefixes if they are booleans. If you want to keep it as is that's fine also.
nodes.diffHunk:

 |projectName|python project name in setup.py (e.g. petstore-api).| |null|
+|setRecursionLimit|Set recursion limit. If not set, use the system default value.| |null|

nodes.bodyText: Thanks for the feedback. Let me revise it.
